  <div class="topic p-responsive container-lg">
    <div class="d-md-flex gutter-md">
      <div class="col-md-8 col-lg-9">
          <div class="border rounded-1 box-shadow bg-white p-4 mb-5">

  <div class="markdown-body f5 mb-2">
    <p>Data visualization is the visual depiction of data through the use of graphs, plots, and informational graphics. Its practitioners use statistics and data science to convey the meaning behind data in ethical and accurate ways.</p>
  </div>
</div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1120619/73306596-8b184e00-41ea-11ea-9a39-4a4f6737c94d.png"><img src="https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1120619/73306596-8b184e00-41ea-11ea-9a39-4a4f6737c94d.png" alt="Screen Shot 2020-01-28 at 4 23 20 PM" style="max-width:100%;"></a></p>
<p>When viewing a list of variables, each row has an ambiguous element labeled "duplicate." The user may not know if this is a tag or status indicator using "duplicate" as an adjective/noun to describe the variable as having a conflict with something else or</p>

                      Read more
</a>                  </div>

            <h1 class="d-inline flex-auto f3 text-normal lh-condensed">
              <a class="text-gray-dark" href="https://github.com/metabase/metabase/issues/11671" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;BIG_GOOD_FIRST_ISSUE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:547746248,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/data-visualization&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="8a4a3b14a9cc3040af8d8942e12787da9191f5c29eb1fc491e4a7f504dc76e87" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;size:large;">
                Indicate if SSL is used for database connection
</a>

            </h1>
          </div>

        </div>

        <div class="d-flex">
          <div class="mr-3">
            <img
              class="avatar avatar-user avatar-small"
              alt="walterl"
              src="https://avatars0.githubusercontent.com/u/23798?v=4"
              width="32"
              height="32"
            >
          </div>
          <div class="flex-auto" style="width: 80%;">
            <div class="Box Box--condensed position-relative timeline-comment--caret">
              <div class="Box-header f6 text-gray">
                <strong class="text-gray-dark text-bold">
                  walterl
                </strong>

                  commented

                <relative-time datetime="2020-01-09T21:57:03Z" class="no-wrap">Jan 9, 2020</relative-time>
              </div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p>When adding a new data store database in Metabase it <a href="https://github.com/metabase/metabase/blob/master/src/metabase/api/database.clj#L346-L362">tries</a> to connect first <em>with</em> SSL (if the driver supports SSL), and then without, in that order. If either connection succeeds, the database details are accepted as valid. Yes, you can add driver specific JDBC options to use SSL, but there is no good feed</p>

                  <div
                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"
                    style="background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(255,255,255,1), rgba(255,255,255,0));"
                  >
                    <a class="btn btn-outline btn-sm mx-auto my-3" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;READ_MORE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:547746248,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/data-visualization&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="c3cbde84f97c35984e5c99eb301f214e86e1e2f30bfccdb709e81476c0e0dfd1" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;text:read more;size:large;" href="https://github.com/metabase/metabase/issues/11671">
                      Read more
</a>                  </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="mt-3">
              <span class="discussion-item-icon border-white-fade-15 ml-0 mr-2">
                <svg height="16" class="octicon octicon-tag" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M2.5 7.775V2.75C2.5 2.6837 2.52634 2.62011 2.57322 2.57322C2.62011 2.52634 2.6837 2.5 2.75 2.5H7.775C7.80785 2.49994 7.84039 2.50636 7.87077 2.51888C7.90114 2.53141 7.92874 2.5498 7.952 2.573L14.202 8.823C14.2253 8.84622 14.2438 8.87381 14.2564 8.90418C14.269 8.93456 14.2754 8.96712 14.2754 9C14.2754 9.03288 14.269 9.06544 14.2564 9.09582C14.2438 9.12619 14.2253 9.15378 14.202 9.177L9.177 14.202C9.15378 14.2253 9.12619 14.2438 9.09582 14.2564C9.06544 14.269 9.03288 14.2754 9 14.2754C8.96712 14.2754 8.93456 14.269 8.90418 14.2564C8.87381 14.2438 8.84622 14.2253 8.823 14.202L2.573 7.952C2.5498 7.92874 2.53141 7.90114 2.51888 7.87077C2.50636 7.84039 2.49994 7.80785 2.5 7.775ZM1 7.775V2.75C1 1.784 1.784 1 2.75 1H7.775C8.239 1 8.685 1.184 9.013 1.513L15.263 7.763C15.5909 8.09115 15.7751 8.53609 15.7751 9C15.7751 9.46391 15.5909 9.90885 15.263 10.237L10.237 15.263C9.90885 15.5909 9.46391 15.7751 9 15.7751C8.53609 15.7751 8.09115 15.5909 7.763 15.263L1.513 9.013C1.35035 8.85047 1.22133 8.65747 1.1333 8.44505C1.04528 8.23263 0.999983 8.00494 1 7.775ZM6 5C5.73478 5 5.48043 5.10536 5.29289 5.29289C5.10536 5.48043 5 5.73478 5 6C5 6.26522 5.10536 6.51957 5.29289 6.70711C5.48043 6.89464 5.73478 7 6 7C6.26522 7 6.51957 6.89464 6.70711 6.70711C6.89464 6.51957 7 6.26522 7 6C7 5.73478 6.89464 5.48043 6.70711 5.29289C6.51957 5.10536 6.26522 5 6 5Z"></path></svg>

              </span>

              <div class="labels lh-condensed">

            <h1 class="d-inline flex-auto f3 text-normal lh-condensed">
              <a class="text-gray-dark" href="https://github.com/plotly/dash/issues/1162" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;BIG_GOOD_FIRST_ISSUE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:586982660,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/data-visualization&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="68457139f2427363cce7277509749f502d9552acd9ae0345b1b4d766430b7cab" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;size:large;">

                  <p>On the chapter about <a href="https://dash.plotly.com/datatable/editable" rel="nofollow">Editable DataTable</a><br>
we can find this :</p>
<pre><code>This chapter includes recipes for:
    Reading the contents of the DataTable
    Filtering out null values
    Uploading data
    Determining which cell has changed 
    Adding or removing columns
    Adding or removing rows
    Clearable, deletable, renamable, and hideable colum
</code></pre>

            <h1 class="d-inline flex-auto f3 text-normal lh-condensed">

                  <h1>Bug report</h1>
<p>Minor issue in documentation page:<br>
<a href="https://apexcharts.com/docs/options/chart/events/" rel="nofollow">https://apexcharts.com/docs/options/chart/events/</a></p>
<p>The click event entry is duplicated.</p>
<h2>Explanation</h2>
<ul>
<li>What is the behavior you expect? Only one entry in this page for mouse click event</li>
<li>What is happening instead? Two entries describing the function</li>
<li>What error message are you getting? N/A</li>
</ul>

              <div class="Box-header f6 text-gray">
                <strong class="text-gray-dark text-bold">
                  andybak

                  commented

                <relative-time datetime="2020-04-17T12:08:48Z" class="no-wrap">Apr 17, 2020</relative-time>
              </div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p>You must be doing something wrong as almost everything turns up above the actual docs - github, gallery, examples.</p>
<p>Even if I search for a specific string from the docs and add "deck.gl" they don't appear.</p>
<p>Your SPA architecture might be breaking something? How about good old server-rendered pages for docs?</p>

            <h1 class="d-inline flex-auto f3 text-normal lh-condensed">
              <a class="text-gray-dark" href="https://github.com/OpenRefine/OpenRefine/issues/2516" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;BIG_GOOD_FIRST_ISSUE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:593770608,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/data-visualization&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="777f551f1ce95d7f32dd347a83e295bf8046d61940952c7d2f792d6db708c806" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;size:large;">
                Creating a project from a URL: URLs with leading whitespace are rejected
</a>

            </h1>

            <div class="f6 text-gray text-right no-wrap mt-1 ml-3">
              <svg height="16" class="octicon octicon-comment text-gray mr-1" color="gray" mr="1" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M2.75 2.5C2.6837 2.5 2.62011 2.52634 2.57322 2.57322C2.52634 2.62011 2.5 2.6837 2.5 2.75V10.25C2.5 10.388 2.612 10.5 2.75 10.5H4.75C4.94891 10.5 5.13968 10.579 5.28033 10.7197C5.42098 10.8603 5.5 11.0511 5.5 11.25V13.44L8.22 10.72C8.36052 10.5793 8.55115 10.5002 8.75 10.5H13.25C13.3163 10.5 13.3799 10.4737 13.4268 10.4268C13.4737 10.3799 13.5 10.3163 13.5 10.25V2.75C13.5 2.6837 13.4737 2.62011 13.4268 2.57322C13.3799 2.52634 13.3163 2.5 13.25 2.5H2.75ZM1 2.75C1 1.784 1.784 1 2.75 1H13.25C14.216 1 15 1.784 15 2.75V10.25C15 10.7141 14.8156 11.1592 14.4874 11.4874C14.1592 11.8156 13.7141 12 13.25 12H9.06L6.487 14.573C6.28324 14.7767 6.02367 14.9153 5.74111 14.9715C5.45854 15.0277 5.16567 14.9988 4.8995 14.8886C4.63333 14.7784 4.40581 14.5917 4.24571 14.3522C4.08561 14.1127 4.0001 13.8311 4 13.543V12H2.75C2.28587 12 1.84075 11.8156 1.51256 11.4874C1.18437 11.1592 1 10.7141 1 10.25V2.75Z"></path></svg>

        <div class="d-flex">
          <div class="mr-3">
            <img
              class="avatar avatar-user avatar-small"
              alt="wetneb"
              src="https://avatars1.githubusercontent.com/u/309908?v=4"
              width="32"
              height="32"
            >
          </div>
          <div class="flex-auto" style="width: 80%;">
            <div class="Box Box--condensed position-relative timeline-comment--caret">
              <div class="Box-header f6 text-gray">
                <strong class="text-gray-dark text-bold">
                  wetneb
                </strong>

                  commented

                <relative-time datetime="2020-04-04T08:12:07Z" class="no-wrap">Apr 4, 2020</relative-time>
              </div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p><strong>Describe the bug</strong></p>
<p>The input field to create a project from a URL does not trim its input when validating it.</p>

<p><strong>To Reproduce</strong><br>
Steps to reproduce the behavior:</p>
<ol>
<li>Go to 'Create Project' -&gt; 'Web Addresses (URL)'</li>
<li>Paste "  <a href="http://api.worldbank.org/countries/all/indicators/SP.POP.TOTL?date=2000:2001" rel="nofollow">http://api.worldbank.org/countries/all/indicators/SP.POP.TOTL?date=2000:2001</a>" with the leading whitespac</li>
</ol>

                  <div
                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"
                    style="background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(255,255,255,1), rgba(255,255,255,0));"
                  >
                    <a class="btn btn-outline btn-sm mx-auto my-3" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;READ_MORE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:593770608,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/data-visualization&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="c2ec29f34e012ec5c55b28f3180970079a56aa33333384963d34a7d94634410f" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;text:read more;size:large;" href="https://github.com/OpenRefine/OpenRefine/issues/2516">
                      Read more
</a>                  </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="mt-3">
              <span class="discussion-item-icon border-white-fade-15 ml-0 mr-2">
                <svg height="16" class="octicon octicon-tag" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M2.5 7.775V2.75C2.5 2.6837 2.52634 2.62011 2.57322 2.57322C2.62011 2.52634 2.6837 2.5 2.75 2.5H7.775C7.80785 2.49994 7.84039 2.50636 7.87077 2.51888C7.90114 2.53141 7.92874 2.5498 7.952 2.573L14.202 8.823C14.2253 8.84622 14.2438 8.87381 14.2564 8.90418C14.269 8.93456 14.2754 8.96712 14.2754 9C14.2754 9.03288 14.269 9.06544 14.2564 9.09582C14.2438 9.12619 14.2253 9.15378 14.202 9.177L9.177 14.202C9.15378 14.2253 9.12619 14.2438 9.09582 14.2564C9.06544 14.269 9.03288 14.2754 9 14.2754C8.96712 14.2754 8.93456 14.269 8.90418 14.2564C8.87381 14.2438 8.84622 14.2253 8.823 14.202L2.573 7.952C2.5498 7.92874 2.53141 7.90114 2.51888 7.87077C2.50636 7.84039 2.49994 7.80785 2.5 7.775ZM1 7.775V2.75C1 1.784 1.784 1 2.75 1H7.775C8.239 1 8.685 1.184 9.013 1.513L15.263 7.763C15.5909 8.09115 15.7751 8.53609 15.7751 9C15.7751 9.46391 15.5909 9.90885 15.263 10.237L10.237 15.263C9.90885 15.5909 9.46391 15.7751 9 15.7751C8.53609 15.7751 8.09115 15.5909 7.763 15.263L1.513 9.013C1.35035 8.85047 1.22133 8.65747 1.1333 8.44505C1.04528 8.23263 0.999983 8.00494 1 7.775ZM6 5C5.73478 5 5.48043 5.10536 5.29289 5.29289C5.10536 5.48043 5 5.73478 5 6C5 6.26522 5.10536 6.51957 5.29289 6.70711C5.48043 6.89464 5.73478 7 6 7C6.26522 7 6.51957 6.89464 6.70711 6.70711C6.89464 6.51957 7 6.26522 7 6C7 5.73478 6.89464 5.48043 6.70711 5.29289C6.51957 5.10536 6.26522 5 6 5Z"></path></svg>

              </span>

              <div class="labels lh-condensed">

            <h1 class="d-inline flex-auto f3 text-normal lh-condensed">
              <a class="text-gray-dark" href="https://github.com/mwaskom/seaborn/issues/2005" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;BIG_GOOD_FIRST_ISSUE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:586892936,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/data-visualization&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="89c1f150d512e1b957579bcbb5f97d3d94ac2fb69f5dc2d21c90ed157a571f7e" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;size:large;">
                pointplot linestyles not showing in legend
</a>

              <svg height="16" class="octicon octicon-comment text-gray mr-1" color="gray" mr="1" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M2.75 2.5C2.6837 2.5 2.62011 2.52634 2.57322 2.57322C2.52634 2.62011 2.5 2.6837 2.5 2.75V10.25C2.5 10.388 2.612 10.5 2.75 10.5H4.75C4.94891 10.5 5.13968 10.579 5.28033 10.7197C5.42098 10.8603 5.5 11.0511 5.5 11.25V13.44L8.22 10.72C8.36052 10.5793 8.55115 10.5002 8.75 10.5H13.25C13.3163 10.5 13.3799 10.4737 13.4268 10.4268C13.4737 10.3799 13.5 10.3163 13.5 10.25V2.75C13.5 2.6837 13.4737 2.62011 13.4268 2.57322C13.3799 2.52634 13.3163 2.5 13.25 2.5H2.75ZM1 2.75C1 1.784 1.784 1 2.75 1H13.25C14.216 1 15 1.784 15 2.75V10.25C15 10.7141 14.8156 11.1592 14.4874 11.4874C14.1592 11.8156 13.7141 12 13.25 12H9.06L6.487 14.573C6.28324 14.7767 6.02367 14.9153 5.74111 14.9715C5.45854 15.0277 5.16567 14.9988 4.8995 14.8886C4.63333 14.7784 4.40581 14.5917 4.24571 14.3522C4.08561 14.1127 4.0001 13.8311 4 13.543V12H2.75C2.28587 12 1.84075 11.8156 1.51256 11.4874C1.18437 11.1592 1 10.7141 1 10.25V2.75Z"></path></svg>

        <div class="d-flex">
          <div class="mr-3">
            <img
              class="avatar avatar-user avatar-small"
              alt="jbachh"
              src="https://avatars0.githubusercontent.com/u/9306134?v=4"

          <div class="flex-auto" style="width: 80%;">
            <div class="Box Box--condensed position-relative timeline-comment--caret">
              <div class="Box-header f6 text-gray">
                <strong class="text-gray-dark text-bold">
                  jbachh
                </strong>

                  commented

                <relative-time datetime="2020-03-24T11:33:16Z" class="no-wrap">Mar 24, 2020</relative-time>
              </div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p>As you can see in this example from the documentation <a href="http://seaborn.pydata.org/generated/seaborn.pointplot.html#seaborn.pointplot" rel="nofollow">docs</a>, there is a linestyles argument, but it doesn't show in the legend. This kind of defies the purpose, printing black/white you still can't tell which is which (except from the markers, but often the markers are hard to read because the line is too wide relativel</p>

                  <div
                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"
                    style="background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(255,255,255,1), rgba(255,255,255,0));"
                  >
                    <a class="btn btn-outline btn-sm mx-auto my-3" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;READ_MORE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:586892936,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/data-visualization&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="140be1e78cc61361a29bd91c70bfb26ba2461c6724273dd0cb537fad72d7cdd1" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;text:read more;size:large;" href="https://github.com/mwaskom/seaborn/issues/2005">
                      Read more
</a>                  </div>
                </div>
            </div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p>There is a <code>@vx/event</code> package but it has no description or examples. It might be helpful to add some documentation for it.</p>

                  <div
                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"
                    style="background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(255,255,255,1), rgba(255,255,255,0));"
                  >

              <div class="Box-header f6 text-gray">
                <strong class="text-gray-dark text-bold">
                  rnrsr
                </strong>

                  commented

                <relative-time datetime="2019-11-05T13:34:51Z" class="no-wrap">Nov 5, 2019</relative-time>
              </div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p>I was following along with the guide for adding a chart: <a href="https://github.com/rawgraphs/raw/wiki/Adding-New-Charts">https://github.com/rawgraphs/raw/wiki/Adding-New-Charts</a></p>
<p>Using the exact code that is specified in the guide, and here: <a href="https://github.com/densitydesign/raw/blob/master/charts/chart.js">https://github.com/densitydesign/raw/blob/master/charts/chart.js</a></p>
<p>At runtime you see an undefined error.</p>
<blockquote>
<p>TypeError: Cannot read property 'linear' of undefined</p>
</blockquote>
<p>It seems as though the latest version of "d3" no longe</p>

                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"

            <h1 class="d-inline flex-auto f3 text-normal lh-condensed">
              <a class="text-gray-dark" href="https://github.com/keplergl/kepler.gl/issues/1071" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;BIG_GOOD_FIRST_ISSUE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:597995999,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/data-visualization&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="70fef1e736021a16784cbb09ae43c1bd68da84e32ba561c5bee9f600da697dc3" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;size:large;">
                GeoJSON with timestamps

              <svg height="16" class="octicon octicon-comment text-gray mr-1" color="gray" mr="1" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M2.75 2.5C2.6837 2.5 2.62011 2.52634 2.57322 2.57322C2.52634 2.62011 2.5 2.6837 2.5 2.75V10.25C2.5 10.388 2.612 10.5 2.75 10.5H4.75C4.94891 10.5 5.13968 10.579 5.28033 10.7197C5.42098 10.8603 5.5 11.0511 5.5 11.25V13.44L8.22 10.72C8.36052 10.5793 8.55115 10.5002 8.75 10.5H13.25C13.3163 10.5 13.3799 10.4737 13.4268 10.4268C13.4737 10.3799 13.5 10.3163 13.5 10.25V2.75C13.5 2.6837 13.4737 2.62011 13.4268 2.57322C13.3799 2.52634 13.3163 2.5 13.25 2.5H2.75ZM1 2.75C1 1.784 1.784 1 2.75 1H13.25C14.216 1 15 1.784 15 2.75V10.25C15 10.7141 14.8156 11.1592 14.4874 11.4874C14.1592 11.8156 13.7141 12 13.25 12H9.06L6.487 14.573C6.28324 14.7767 6.02367 14.9153 5.74111 14.9715C5.45854 15.0277 5.16567 14.9988 4.8995 14.8886C4.63333 14.7784 4.40581 14.5917 4.24571 14.3522C4.08561 14.1127 4.0001 13.8311 4 13.543V12H2.75C2.28587 12 1.84075 11.8156 1.51256 11.4874C1.18437 11.1592 1 10.7141 1 10.25V2.75Z"></path></svg>

        <div class="d-flex">
          <div class="mr-3">
            <img
              class="avatar avatar-user avatar-small"
              alt="Anaisdg"
              src="https://avatars1.githubusercontent.com/u/30506042?v=4"
              width="32"
              height="32"
            >
          </div>
          <div class="flex-auto" style="width: 80%;">
            <div class="Box Box--condensed position-relative timeline-comment--caret">
              <div class="Box-header f6 text-gray">
                <strong class="text-gray-dark text-bold">
                  Anaisdg
                </strong>

                  commented

                <relative-time datetime="2020-04-10T17:14:32Z" class="no-wrap">Apr 10, 2020</relative-time>
              </div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p>What would the GeoJSON with timestamps look like? Looking at the <a href="https://github.com/keplergl/kepler.gl/blob/master/docs/user-guides/h-playback.md">playback part of the user guide</a>, it's unclear to be whether your GeoJSON should contain arrays of values and corresponding timestamps for each location? Is the following correct?</p>
<pre><code>var statesData = {
    "type": "Feature",
    "properties": {
</code></pre>

                  <div
                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"
                    style="background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(255,255,255,1), rgba(255,255,255,0));"
                  >
                    <a class="btn btn-outline btn-sm mx-auto my-3" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;READ_MORE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:597995999,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/data-visualization&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="710d61bcb6b9af256517cd531e7ebc4df6e3236d610063d0e96d8973ccf91911" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;text:read more;size:large;" href="https://github.com/keplergl/kepler.gl/issues/1071">
                      Read more
</a>                  </div>
                </div>

  <span itemprop="programmingLanguage">HTML</span>
</span>

            </li>
        </ul>
      </div>
  </div>
</article>

            <h1 class="d-inline flex-auto f3 text-normal lh-condensed">

            <h1 class="d-inline flex-auto f3 text-normal lh-condensed">
              <a class="text-gray-dark" href="https://github.com/visgl/react-map-gl/issues/1085" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;BIG_GOOD_FIRST_ISSUE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:605908101,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/data-visualization&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="47a56fd63510cf6321035fb7a10e50594844a997b6ef00ac1854830e90d22acf" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;size:large;">
                Permit `padding` in transitions
</a>

            </h1>

            <div class="f6 text-gray text-right no-wrap mt-1 ml-3">
              <svg height="16" class="octicon octicon-comment text-gray mr-1" color="gray" mr="1" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M2.75 2.5C2.6837 2.5 2.62011 2.52634 2.57322 2.57322C2.52634 2.62011 2.5 2.6837 2.5 2.75V10.25C2.5 10.388 2.612 10.5 2.75 10.5H4.75C4.94891 10.5 5.13968 10.579 5.28033 10.7197C5.42098 10.8603 5.5 11.0511 5.5 11.25V13.44L8.22 10.72C8.36052 10.5793 8.55115 10.5002 8.75 10.5H13.25C13.3163 10.5 13.3799 10.4737 13.4268 10.4268C13.4737 10.3799 13.5 10.3163 13.5 10.25V2.75C13.5 2.6837 13.4737 2.62011 13.4268 2.57322C13.3799 2.52634 13.3163 2.5 13.25 2.5H2.75ZM1 2.75C1 1.784 1.784 1 2.75 1H13.25C14.216 1 15 1.784 15 2.75V10.25C15 10.7141 14.8156 11.1592 14.4874 11.4874C14.1592 11.8156 13.7141 12 13.25 12H9.06L6.487 14.573C6.28324 14.7767 6.02367 14.9153 5.74111 14.9715C5.45854 15.0277 5.16567 14.9988 4.8995 14.8886C4.63333 14.7784 4.40581 14.5917 4.24571 14.3522C4.08561 14.1127 4.0001 13.8311 4 13.543V12H2.75C2.28587 12 1.84075 11.8156 1.51256 11.4874C1.18437 11.1592 1 10.7141 1 10.25V2.75Z"></path></svg>

        <div class="d-flex">
          <div class="mr-3">
            <img
              class="avatar avatar-user avatar-small"
              alt="harto"
              src="https://avatars2.githubusercontent.com/u/103448?v=4"
              width="32"

          <div class="flex-auto" style="width: 80%;">
            <div class="Box Box--condensed position-relative timeline-comment--caret">
              <div class="Box-header f6 text-gray">
                <strong class="text-gray-dark text-bold">
                  harto
                </strong>

                  commented

                <relative-time datetime="2020-04-23T22:13:37Z" class="no-wrap">Apr 23, 2020</relative-time>
              </div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p><a href="https://github.com/mapbox/mapbox-gl-js/releases/tag/v1.9.0">Mapbox GL JS 1.9</a> added support for <code>padding</code> in camera functions <code>flyTo</code>, <code>jumpTo</code>, etc.: <a class="issue-link js-issue-link" data-error-text="Failed to load title" data-id="480956770" data-permission-text="Title is private" data-url="https://github.com/mapbox/mapbox-gl-js/issues/8638" data-hovercard-type="pull_request" data-hovercard-url="/mapbox/mapbox-gl-js/pull/8638/hovercard" href="https://github.com/mapbox/mapbox-gl-js/pull/8638">mapbox/mapbox-gl-js#8638</a>.</p>
<p>It would be great if a similar option was made available through this library. Our use case is that we need to adjust the target viewport based on the width of a sidebar.</p>

                  <div
                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"
                    style="background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(255,255,255,1), rgba(255,255,255,0));"
                  >
                    <a class="btn btn-outline btn-sm mx-auto my-3" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;READ_MORE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:605908101,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/data-visualization&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="3d549b4fdbfdbf21b0443a3ba81a332b0c6df0a8b7c46069bf9824626836c7a3" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;text:read more;size:large;" href="https://github.com/visgl/react-map-gl/issues/1085">
                      Read more
</a>                  </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="mt-3">
              <span class="discussion-item-icon border-white-fade-15 ml-0 mr-2">
                <svg height="16" class="octicon octicon-tag" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M2.5 7.775V2.75C2.5 2.6837 2.52634 2.62011 2.57322 2.57322C2.62011 2.52634 2.6837 2.5 2.75 2.5H7.775C7.80785 2.49994 7.84039 2.50636 7.87077 2.51888C7.90114 2.53141 7.92874 2.5498 7.952 2.573L14.202 8.823C14.2253 8.84622 14.2438 8.87381 14.2564 8.90418C14.269 8.93456 14.2754 8.96712 14.2754 9C14.2754 9.03288 14.269 9.06544 14.2564 9.09582C14.2438 9.12619 14.2253 9.15378 14.202 9.177L9.177 14.202C9.15378 14.2253 9.12619 14.2438 9.09582 14.2564C9.06544 14.269 9.03288 14.2754 9 14.2754C8.96712 14.2754 8.93456 14.269 8.90418 14.2564C8.87381 14.2438 8.84622 14.2253 8.823 14.202L2.573 7.952C2.5498 7.92874 2.53141 7.90114 2.51888 7.87077C2.50636 7.84039 2.49994 7.80785 2.5 7.775ZM1 7.775V2.75C1 1.784 1.784 1 2.75 1H7.775C8.239 1 8.685 1.184 9.013 1.513L15.263 7.763C15.5909 8.09115 15.7751 8.53609 15.7751 9C15.7751 9.46391 15.5909 9.90885 15.263 10.237L10.237 15.263C9.90885 15.5909 9.46391 15.7751 9 15.7751C8.53609 15.7751 8.09115 15.5909 7.763 15.263L1.513 9.013C1.35035 8.85047 1.22133 8.65747 1.1333 8.44505C1.04528 8.23263 0.999983 8.00494 1 7.775ZM6 5C5.73478 5 5.48043 5.10536 5.29289 5.29289C5.10536 5.48043 5 5.73478 5 6C5 6.26522 5.10536 6.51957 5.29289 6.70711C5.48043 6.89464 5.73478 7 6 7C6.26522 7 6.51957 6.89464 6.70711 6.70711C6.89464 6.51957 7 6.26522 7 6C7 5.73478 6.89464 5.48043 6.70711 5.29289C6.51957 5.10536 6.26522 5 6 5Z"></path></svg>

                <relative-time datetime="2019-10-19T10:30:52Z" class="no-wrap">Oct 19, 2019</relative-time>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p>Not really an issue but thought I would mention it. When installed via npm the dist folder contains two resources for the minified code:-</p>
<p><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2349765/67143475-9b23a780-f263-11e9-87b2-0b34b9010065.png"><img src="https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2349765/67143475-9b23a780-f263-11e9-87b2-0b34b9010065.png" alt="image" style="max-width:100%;"></a></p>
<p>It wasn't immediately clear which one to use so maybe you can remove one.</p>
<p>Thanks for a great package.</p>

                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"

            <span class="State State--green State--small v-align-bottom mr-1" title="Status: open">
  
              <svg height="16" class="octicon octicon-issue-opened" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M8 1.5C6.27609 1.5 4.62279 2.18482 3.40381 3.40381C2.18482 4.62279 1.5 6.27609 1.5 8C1.5 9.72391 2.18482 11.3772 3.40381 12.5962C4.62279 13.8152 6.27609 14.5 8 14.5C9.72391 14.5 11.3772 13.8152 12.5962 12.5962C13.8152 11.3772 14.5 9.72391 14.5 8C14.5 6.27609 13.8152 4.62279 12.5962 3.40381C11.3772 2.18482 9.72391 1.5 8 1.5ZM0 8C0 5.87827 0.842855 3.84344 2.34315 2.34315C3.84344 0.842855 5.87827 0 8 0C10.1217 0 12.1566 0.842855 13.6569 2.34315C15.1571 3.84344 16 5.87827 16 8C16 10.1217 15.1571 12.1566 13.6569 13.6569C12.1566 15.1571 10.1217 16 8 16C5.87827 16 3.84344 15.1571 2.34315 13.6569C0.842855 12.1566 0 10.1217 0 8ZM9 11C9 11.2652 8.89464 11.5196 8.70711 11.7071C8.51957 11.8946 8.26522 12 8 12C7.73478 12 7.48043 11.8946 7.29289 11.7071C7.10536 11.5196 7 11.2652 7 11C7 10.7348 7.10536 10.4804 7.29289 10.2929C7.48043 10.1054 7.73478 10 8 10C8.26522 10 8.51957 10.1054 8.70711 10.2929C8.89464 10.4804 9 10.7348 9 11ZM8.75 4.75C8.75 4.55109 8.67098 4.36032 8.53033 4.21967C8.38968 4.07902 8.19891 4 8 4C7.80109 4 7.61032 4.07902 7.46967 4.21967C7.32902 4.36032 7.25 4.55109 7.25 4.75V8.25C7.25 8.44891 7.32902 8.63968 7.46967 8.78033C7.61032 8.92098 7.80109 9 8 9C8.19891 9 8.38968 8.92098 8.53033 8.78033C8.67098 8.63968 8.75 8.44891 8.75 8.25V4.75Z"></path></svg>

</span>

            <h1 class="d-inline flex-auto f3 text-normal lh-condensed">
              <a class="text-gray-dark" href="https://github.com/pa7/heatmap.js/issues/299" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;BIG_GOOD_FIRST_ISSUE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:352481439,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/data-visualization&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="34f183cad49ab1b7d59f69aa33856e6bcacd5344d8b107bad2eb08e5dc501f7c" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;size:large;">
                Google Maps Plugin loses point values if valueField not set in config
</a>

            </h1>
          </div>

        </div>

        <div class="d-flex">
          <div class="mr-3">
            <img
              class="avatar avatar-user avatar-small"
              alt="JAEarly"
              src="https://avatars2.githubusercontent.com/u/7620667?v=4"
              width="32"
              height="32"
            >
          </div>
          <div class="flex-auto" style="width: 80%;">
            <div class="Box Box--condensed position-relative timeline-comment--caret">
              <div class="Box-header f6 text-gray">
                <strong class="text-gray-dark text-bold">
                  JAEarly
                </strong>

                  commented

                <relative-time datetime="2018-08-21T10:35:52Z" class="no-wrap">Aug 21, 2018</relative-time>
              </div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p>If the valueField parameter is not set in the config, the documentation specifies that valueField parameter should fall back to 'value'. However, the values are at some point through the plugin. I have created a fix so will make a pull request shortly.</p>

                  <div
                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"
                    style="background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(255,255,255,1), rgba(255,255,255,0));"
                  >
                    <a class="btn btn-outline btn-sm mx-auto my-3" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;READ_MORE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:352481439,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/data-visualization&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="3d0c55ac9278ac2e7fb924faf01d435115a980abd8972db5ee4fde874a7fb8e8" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;text:read more;size:large;" href="https://github.com/pa7/heatmap.js/issues/299">
                      Read more
</a>                  </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="mt-3">
              <span class="discussion-item-icon border-white-fade-15 ml-0 mr-2">

<p>I've noticed an issue when dynamically switching axis labels on a chart. It seems that the first time the alternate axis is rendered, it ignores formatting set in the label component. Rendering the alternate a</p>

          <p class="text-gray mb-0"><div>JavaScript diagramming library for interactive flowcharts, org charts, design tools, planning tools, visual languages.</div></p>

            <div class="Box Box--condensed position-relative timeline-comment--caret">
              <div class="Box-header f6 text-gray">
                <strong class="text-gray-dark text-bold">
                  Timmmm
                </strong>

                  commented

                <relative-time datetime="2019-10-29T14:11:18Z" class="no-wrap">Oct 29, 2019</relative-time>
              </div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p>This is really awesome, thanks! One minor feature request - is there a way to change the transition easing curve? You can change the durations, but the easing curve appears to be hard-coded to <code>easeExpInOut</code> which I find a bit "snappy". I think this is the relevant code:</p>
<pre><code>function newCubeLayer(presenter, config, cubeData, highlightColor, lightSettings, lightingMix, interpolator) {
    cons
</code></pre>

                  <div
                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"
                    style="background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(255,255,255,1), rgba(255,255,255,0));"
                  >
